about_the_game:
Neko Neko Rampage is a co-op action game in which a group of ragtag cats is trying to save the world, by making one huge mess at a time!  Each player controls a rolling cat and has to work together with up to 3 other friends, to make the biggest destruction possible in the time limit. 


A Co-Op Catventure

Follow Nico and his friends in an adventure to make cats the supreme race on planet Earth, as they did in the past! For that, you and your friends will help them find the hidden "Golden Yarns" in various environments. Starting from the grandma's house, the cats will visit a supermarket, a museum, a shopping center, a research lab... and even another dimension!


Crazy physics interactions!

In Neko Neko Rampage, objects can have different elements that interact with each other in various ways: Fire, Water, Electricity, and Explosives. Electricity is carried over by water, water puts down fire, fire creates explosions... and you have to be careful around them, knowing when to step back, or to use them to your advantage!


Play Online, Locally, or BOTH!

You can play with up to 4 players online, locally, or a mix of both. The game will feature a campaign to be played cooperatively with friends, and an endless mode, where you can test your skills.

name: Neko Neko Rampage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 3.5GHz or AMD FX-4170
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 540 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.5GHz or AMD FX 6 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R7 270X (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Roll fast and make a mess! Welcome to a colorful world of cats and chaos. In Neko Neko Rampage, you will join the feline ranks and gather online or locally with friends to wreck and bring mayhem and destruction on your way.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
